title: The Foundations of wealth. Part 1. How it all began
brief_description: Uses animation and docuemtary footage to establish the concept of living at subsistence level. Shows how vulnerable people are when they need to consume everything they produce in order to survive and points towards the concept of creating a surplus. Suitable for secondary school level.
